H0.text: if there is a line that lies parallel to the horizon it is said to be. Convergent Line

H1.text: if there is a line that lies parallel to the horizon it is said to be. Horizon Line

H2.text: if there is a line that lies parallel to the horizon it is said to be. Parallel Line

H3.text: if there is a line that lies parallel to the horizon it is said to be. A vanishing point

A4.text: Parallel lines are coplanar infinite straight lines that do not intersect at any point.

A5.text: Every point on line m is located at exactly the same (minimum) distance from line l (equidistant lines).
